examples: The bartender served a cocktail in a fancy glass.
Hey Noah, fancy taking a spin to the grocery store with me?
The vision seems a flight of fancy.
They really fancy themselves after only one hit song!
He writes his thoughts and ideas in a journal with a fancy pen.
words.defineEn: elaborate in structure and with a lot of decorations
words.defineVi: xây dựng trong cấu trúc và với rất nhiều đồ trang trí

examples: So it's like posh pot tobacco.
The saga of the stripey house offered a glimpse into the secret world of posh neighbors at war.
This prudishness didn’t just exist for the posh british victorians.
And the drilling down is causing headaches outside the council chamber, as complaints and disputes between posh neighbors build up.
This involved updates to infrastructure, like dorms, classrooms, eating facilities, and fitness centers in order to increase their posh appearances and justify sky-rocketing costs.
words.defineEn: elegant, sophisticated, fashionable, and associated with wealth and luxury
words.defineVi: thanh lịch, tinh tế, thời trang, và gắn liền với sự giàu có và sang trọng

examples: He bragged that the test was easy, but when he saw his grade he changed his tune.
I'm bragging.
My dad would also brag about these things, whenever he got some crazy deal.
They brag that their golf clubs are identical to the ones used by professional golfers.
You also had statesmen like Pericles, whose famous funeral oration brags about the golden democracy of Athens with rhetoric that wouldn’t sound out of place today.
words.defineEn: to talk boastfully or excessively about one's achievements, possessions, or abilities
words.defineVi: nói một cách khoe khoang hoặc thái quá về thành tích, tài sản hoặc khả năng của một người

examples: He can boast that he married the richest woman in the world.

The elephant boasts the largest brain of any land mammal, as well as an impressive encephalization quotient.
It boasts, crystal clear communication with its virtual boom arm.
And boasts an immersive soundscape and lasting comfort.
words.defineEn: to talk with great pride about one's achievements, abilities, etc.
words.defineVi: để nói chuyện với niềm tự hào to lớn về thành tích, khả năng của một người, v.v.

examples: For a limited time, every car in our range is available for nothing down!
When Tim arrived home after his backpacking trip, he looked like he was just skin and bones from all the hiking and limited food.

When Sarah was a college student with limited funds, she found herself less interested in shopping and spending time in commercial areas, demonstrating how a moneyless man goes fast through the market.

The evidence base is somewhat limited.
words.defineEn: restricted or circumscribed in scope, extent, or amount
words.defineVi: bị hạn chế hoặc giới hạn trong phạm vi, mức độ hoặc số lượng

words.defineEn: restricted or limited in space, area, or movement
words.defineVi: bị hạn chế hoặc giới hạn về không gian, khu vực hoặc chuyển động

examples: We need the results now.

The bakery incorporated finely diced fatback into savory pie crusts for flaky results.
If you invest time and energy into learning and personal growth, you will see positive results in your life.
words.defineEn: something that is caused by something else
words.defineVi: một cái gì đó được gây ra bởi một cái gì đó khác

examples: As a result, the employees had to deal with the consequences of his poor choices.

examples: It's not taking a trip down memory lane or longing and yearning for the good old days or fond memories of what's no more.

And you felt that yearning and that deficit in your being and you'd go around and ask actual people.
words.defineEn: a strong feeling of longing, desire or craving for something or someone
words.defineVi: một cảm giác khao khát mạnh mẽ, mong muốn hoặc khao khát một cái gì đó hoặc ai đó

examples: The refreshing mombin juice quenched my thirst on a hot summer day.
Distant water will not quench your immediate thirst, and it's important to address pressing issues first.

words.defineEn: a strong desire or longing for something
words.defineVi: một mong muốn mạnh mẽ hoặc khao khát một cái gì đó

examples: Many schools don’t take full advantage of the Internet.

She has a weakness for polite men, use that to your advantage.

words.defineEn: a benefit or gain resulting from something
words.defineVi: một lợi ích hoặc đạt được kết quả từ một cái gì đó

examples: The referee gave him the benefit of the doubt.

words.defineVi: một lợi thế hoặc một hiệu ứng hữu ích đó là kết quả của một tình huống

examples: Uncontrolled worry is one of the hallmarks of generalized anxiety disorder.

It was an uncontrolled new environment.
words.defineEn: not regulated, restrained, or governed, and therefore, chaotic, disorderly, or wild

words.defineEn: behaving in an unrestrained or unchecked manner, often to the point of being reckless or aggressive

examples: The closet had a separate section for hanging long garments like coats and dresses.

words.defineVi: một bộ quần áo mà một người mặc cùng nhau, đặc biệt là cho một sự kiện hoặc dịp

examples: Your explanation is too complicated!

words.defineEn: difficult to understand, deal with, or explain due to having many parts or factors

words.defineVi: hoàn toàn bối rối, bối rối hoặc bí ẩn bởi một cái gì đó

words.defineEn: having an inferior quality or ranking, especially when compared to others of its kind
words.defineVi: có chất lượng hoặc xếp hạng kém hơn, đặc biệt là khi so sánh với những loại khác

examples: The magazine keeps tabs on the latest fashion trends.

examples: My father is quite old now

words.defineEn: (of a thing) having been used or existing for a long period of time
words.defineVi: (của một thứ) đã được sử dụng hoặc tồn tại trong một thời gian dài

examples: Ancient historians wrote of a lost continent beneath the ocean.

examples: Current drilling technology thus barely scrapes the surface.

words.defineEn: belonging to or happening at the present time
words.defineVi: thuộc về hoặc xảy ra tại thời điểm hiện tại

examples: They've got up-to-date info on their sites.

words.defineEn: no longer in use, suitable for current circumstances, or relevant to modern times

examples: That contest wasn't fair!

words.defineEn: not fair, equitable or reasonable, often involving an abuse or violation of rights or privileges

examples: BBC is falling over backwards to be impartial by describing this as a crowd!

words.defineEn: not favoring a particular party in a way that enables one to act or decide fairly

words.defineEn: having strong, unreasonable, and unfair opinions or attitudes, especially about a particular race or religion, and refusing to listen to different opinions or ideas
words.defineVi: có quan điểm hoặc thái độ mạnh mẽ, vô lý và không công bằng, đặc biệt là về một chủng tộc hoặc tôn giáo cụ thể và từ chối lắng nghe các quan điểm hoặc ý tưởng khác nhau

examples: We had a side salad with our main course for a balanced meal.

words.defineEn: based only on facts and not influenced by personal feelings or judgments

words.defineVi: không có lỗi, sai lầm hoặc lỗi

words.defineEn: without any mistakes or errors
words.defineVi: mà không có bất kỳ sai lầm hoặc lỗi

examples: The book raises many important questions.

words.defineVi: cần hành động hoặc sự chú ý ngay lập tức

words.defineEn: having little importance or significance

words.defineEn: describing behavior, actions, or things that are characterized by a lack of seriousness, depth, or significance

examples: Ancient is not a synonym for stupid.

words.defineEn: a word or phrase that has the same or nearly the same meaning as another word or phrase in the same language

words.phonetic: təbi meɪd ʌv stɜːnɚ slæʃ tʌfɚ stʌf

words.defineEn: used to say that things can happen unexpectedly or unplanned, and sometimes there is nothing we can do about it
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để nói rằng mọi thứ có thể xảy ra bất ngờ hoặc không có kế hoạch, và đôi khi chúng ta không thể làm gì được

words.defineEn: used to convey satisfaction, approval, or encouragement towards something, such as a good performance, a successful task, or a delicious food or drink
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để truyền đạt sự hài lòng, tán thành hoặc khuyến khích đối với một cái gì đó, chẳng hạn như một màn trình diễn tốt, một nhiệm vụ thành công hoặc một món ăn ngon hoặc đồ uống

words.phonetic: tə noʊ wʌn bækslæʃ ɛs stʌf
words.defineEn: to be very knowledgeable about or skillful in a particular field of work
words.defineVi: rất am hiểu hoặc có kỹ năng trong một lĩnh vực công việc cụ thể

words.defineEn: a word or phrase that has an opposite or contrasting meaning to another word or phrase
words.defineVi: một từ hoặc cụm từ có nghĩa đối lập hoặc tương phản với một từ hoặc cụm từ khác

examples: Art serves an important function in our society.
The repairman fixed the faulty wiring, and now the electrical system in the house was functioning as right as rain.
I can't even function in the morning until I've had my first cup of joe.
The gentlemen's agreement was never intended to apply to executive functions.
Furthermore, a well-integrated system bridges the divide among multiple, diverse functions within an organization.
words.defineEn: a particular activity of a person or thing or their purpose
words.defineVi: một hoạt động cụ thể của một người hoặc vật hoặc mục đích của họ

examples: The restaurant featured a signature dish of slow-roasted brisket.
The brunch special featured a beefburger with a sunny-side-up egg, crispy bacon, and a dollop of hollandaise sauce.
The menu featured a creative dish of beef plate tacos.
The farm-to-table restaurant featured a signature dish of picnic shoulder with creamy sauce.
The magazine features interviews with musicians and reviews of new albums.
words.defineEn: an important or distinctive aspect of something
words.defineVi: một khía cạnh quan trọng hoặc đặc biệt của một cái gì đó

examples: The machine takes its name from its inventor.
The guidance system keeps the machine on course.
The machine is worked by wind power.
The machine records your messages and you can answer them at your convenience.
An industrial machine like that can cut through any material like a knife through butter.
words.defineEn: any piece of equipment that is mechanical, electric, etc. and performs a particular task
words.defineVi: bất kỳ thiết bị nào là cơ khí, điện, v.v. và thực hiện một nhiệm vụ cụ thể

examples: The stove is an essential appliance in every kitchen.
J.C. Penney placed a new bet on appliances.
J.C. Penney would never catch up to Sears and appliances.
Healthier diets, the availability of ethnic dishes and the popularity of appliances like food processors were on the rise.
And they often lack amenities like kitchen appliances and laundry that save apartment-dwellers time and money.
words.defineEn: a machine or piece of equipment, especially electrical equipment, such as washing machine, dishwasher, etc. that is used for a particular task
words.defineVi: một máy hoặc một phần của thiết bị, đặc biệt là thiết bị điện, chẳng hạn như máy giặt, máy rửa chén, v.v. được sử dụng cho một nhiệm vụ cụ thể

examples: The passion fruit smoothie is a popular choice at the café.
The refreshing Muscat grape juice was the perfect choice for a hot summer day.
Camembert is an excellent choice for a picnic.
A Granny Smith apple is a popular choice for juicing.
On the credit side, the restaurant offers a wide range of choices.
words.defineEn: an act of deciding to choose between two things or more
words.defineVi: một hành động quyết định lựa chọn giữa hai điều hoặc nhiều hơn

examples: The bakery offered gluten-free options for customers with dietary restrictions.
The vegetarian menu offers a delicious black bean burrito as a protein-packed option.
I'm always keeping my options open Sophia.
For a gluten-free option, substitute regular flour with almond flour in the cake recipe.
They finally added a delicious veggie burger option to their menu.
words.defineEn: something that can or may be chosen from a number of alternatives
words.defineVi: một cái gì đó có thể hoặc có thể được chọn từ một số lựa chọn thay thế

examples: The consumer has been driving the economy for a number of years.
Consumer finance is not necessarily a money spinner any longer.
Today's consumers do not keep the Sabbath.
The dairy products market will also be driven by consumer demand.
The government has passed new legislation to protect consumers.
words.defineEn: someone who buys and uses services or goods
words.defineVi: một người mua và sử dụng dịch vụ hoặc hàng hóa

examples: Shoppers took cover behind cars as police marksmen returned fire.
Shoppers buy furniture less frequently than things like t-shirts and toys.
Shoppers visited J.C. Penney stores - thrill of a deal.
Please meet your shopper at the door.
Please meet your shopper at the door.
words.defineEn: someone who goes to shops for looking at or buying something
words.defineVi: ai đó đi đến các cửa hàng để xem xét hoặc mua một cái gì đó
